content: Use the Force to help you grip those slippery sushi rolls by grabbing them with the lightsaber light-up chop sticks. Each mini lightsaber features a detailed hilt that illuminates the transparent molds in either an ominous Vader red or a hopeful Luke blue.

Explore the wonders beneath the ocean’s surface while receiving a heart-pumping workout as you row about in the inflatable clear bottom kayak. It features two clear bottom viewing panels that allow you and a buddy to view the amazing underwater landscapes.

titleEN: You Suck At Parking Business Cards
content: Perform your civic duty by shaming terrible parking jobs with the “You Suck At Parking” business cards. Whenever you come across an asshole double parked or spread across three spaces, simply place one of these professional style business cards on their car.

Not all pooches are natural born swimmers, luckily for them the doggy floatation device exists! The ergonomic design is made to comfortably fit your four legged friend and not hinder their movements as they splash around in the water.

Place an eerie touch on the room as you provide some great ambient lighting with the colored skull candles. Available in a plethora of lively colors, the vibrant skulls feature a realistic design and create a jaw dropping image as they begin to melt away once they’re lit.

Help shield your fancy and expensive smartphone from your clumsy self with the iPhone screen protector. This shock-proof, explosion-proof, and scratch resistant ultra clear film conveniently sticks onto the screen to act as a force field so it stays looking good as new.

This book distills Jim Henson’s career philosophy into ten lessons then illustrates them with examples from his business dealings, movies, and TV shows. It’s a true a walk down memory lane for anyone who grew up with Kermit, Snuffy, and the Fraggles.

Concoct eye-catching cocktails that look even better than they taste by topping them off with the LED ice cubes. The moment they touch cool liquid, these high tech cubes activate and shine in a multitude of various colors perfect for livening up any type of drink.

Get one step closer to living in the home of the future by synchronizing your lights with the app controlled light bulb kit. No longer must you waste valuable energy getting up, now you can simply grab your phone and control any light with a tap of the finger.

Ensure you remain undisturbed while getting your beauty rest by telling the world to stay away with the “Fuck Off” sleep mask. As the black satin caresses your skin it proudly displays a big “Fuck Off” message to keep others far away as you slumber.

Add to the authenticity of your personal watering hole by having guests hang their winter wear on the dart coat hooks. Ideal for dart enthusiasts, they screw directly into the wall to provide a sturdy hanging spot capable of handling the weight of even the bulkiest of garments.

No gas station nearby? No Problem! Explore the great outdoors for longer periods when you equip your vehicle with the portable fuel storage kit. Each canister securely latches onto a specially mounted rack so you always have a bountiful supply of fuel when you need it.

The game that makes it socially acceptable to rub up against your most attractive friends is back and better than ever. So put your flexibility to the test as you bend and contort your body into weirdly familiar sexual positions on the inflatable outdoor twister mattress.

Say goodbye to watered down cocktails once and for all by cooling them with the whiskey stones. By adding a couple of these stones to your drink, you’ll be able to keep it icy cold for long periods of time without having to worry about constantly refilling with ice.

titleEN: Story Books In Your Own Voice
content: No matter how hectic your workday, ensure you never miss story time by recording story books in your own voice. Perfect for the workaholic parent, the device plays back the recording and comforts junior as they listen to their favorite story told by their loving parent.

Experience the madness of extreme indoor car racing by defying gravity with the wall climbing remote control cars. These wonder cars don’t just stop when they hit vertical surfaces, they keep going and tackle just about anything such as walls, windows, and even ceilings.

Experience what bankruptcy is like in a galaxy far, far away by partaking in a rousing game of Star Wars Monopoly. The pieces come styled like the iconic movie characters from all six installments with settlements and cities instead of classic houses and hotels.

Enjoy the finer things in life no matter where you find yourself by bringing along the inflatable hot tub. Rather than having to make costly renovations to the home, this economical spa inflates in minutes to provide a luxurious and completely portable hot tub.

Keep your four legged friend entertained for hours on end with minimal effort on your part by using the laser pet collar. The laser pointer easily latches on to most collars and features an array of settings designed to stimulate and amuse your pet.

Experience the cleansing power of your favorite artery-clogging food first hand when you begin showering with bacon soap. Made with an incredibly realistic appearance and intoxicating aroma, you’ll be tempted to take a big bite of this soap every time you shower.

Keep your fingers strong and nimble by incorporating the hand exerciser into your workouts. Ideal for musicians, it increases and helps maintain strength and dexterity in your fingers in addition to providing a rigorous workout for the hands and forearms.

Start living the exciting life you’ve always envisioned by following the teachings of the “Do Cool Shit” book. No matter how far-fetched your dream job may seem at first, this book will teach you everything you need to know in order to make it a reality.

Create the illusion you’ve become infected with help from the zombie open wound prosthetic. Using this latex prosthetic and following the helpful make-up tips provided, you’ll be able to create some truly grotesque, horrific, and possibly contagious wounds.

Help ensure a night of drinking remains fun and incident-free by testing your blood alcohol level using the smartphone breathalyzer keychain. This handy keychain allows you to easily measure your BAC so you can monitor your buzz and drink responsibly.

Get the protection you need from harmful UV rays by venturing outside with the clampable umbrella. When the sun’s shining down with all its fury, simply clamp the umbrella down and adjust the swiveling top to the exact angle you need.

Turn your study aid into a unique and educational night light by flicking on the illuminated globe. Once the globe is lit, the planet’s physical geography such as mountain ranges and underwater topography are revealed in stunning detail.

Keep nighttime accidents to a minimum by outfitting your home with motion sensor outdoor lights. The simple design lets you adhere these portable lights to various surfaces allowing you to place them virtually anywhere that needs a little extra illumination.

Give your appearance a touch of brilliance with the rainbow caviar manicure kit. This extravagant limited edition shade dazzles the senses by giving your nails a unique three dimensional texture that provides a playful yet sophisticated look.

Avoid having to climb down to unplug tools by keeping the wrap around extension cord at your side. The functional design features a flexible gooseneck that allows you to wrap and bend it around just about anything so it’s always handy.

Keep your refreshments handy at all times when relaxing in the yard with the outdoor drink holder. It’s designed to hold two drinks at once and features a durable steel welded construction that won’t crack or break with heavy use.

Get one step closer to having the home of your dreams by installing your very own arcade machine! With the classic arcade games machine you’ll be able to enjoy over 120 iconic old school games like Asteroids and Space Invaders in one glorious retro package.

Make your outfits a bit more vibrant by accessorizing with the colorwheel watch. This attractive timepiece is complemented by an elegant leather band and sports a unique multicolored face with a different hue on each number for simplified time telling.

Prepare a mouth-watering poultry feast for all your friends and family with the beer-can chicken rack and drip pan. Using this stainless steel rack you can grill up a delicious beer infused chicken without creating a big greasy mess.

Give your disposable lighter some extra juice by turning it into a mini blowtorch using the lighter blowtorch attachment.  Once fastened to the top of the lighter, it creates a bright blowtorch styled flame capable of reaching temperatures of up to 2300 Fahrenheit.

Add a sense of adventure to your kitty’s uneventful days by placing him inside the Cadillac cat playhouse. This cardboard box assembles in a snap and takes the form of a pimped out classic pink Cadillac equipped with a customized “meow” license plate.

Unleash your imagination as you create art using the HD touch pen display. The 21.5″ HD screen allows you to work naturally and intuitively by letting you edit your work directly on the screen utilizing an advanced pressure and tilt-sensitive pen.

Experience your favorite songs in a whole new light when you listen to them through the headphone amplifier. This brightly colored gizmo includes a high quality Shuguang 12AU7 tube to bring you the non fatiguing sound of Class A amplification.

Never miss a beat when you stay connected to your favorite social media network with the Instagram feed photo frame. It’s the 21st century photo frame that automatically syncs to your account and displays your personalized Instagram feed for your viewing pleasure.

Defy the laws of physics as you create the illusion of liquid traveling in reverse with the soap bubble hourglass. Upon being flipped, the soapy water creates hundreds of little bubbles that flow back and forth to create an incredible visual effect.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Indoor Basketball Hoop
content: Enjoy an exciting game of hoops day or night using the glow in the dark indoor basketball hoop. This luminescent setup comes decked out with a spring action break-away glow in the dark rim complemented by equally radiant backboard graphics.

Develop the chiseled body you’ve always dreamed of by training with the water rowing exercise machine. The solid ash and honey oak construction along with the water flywheel provide a grueling workout while replicating a real rowing feel.

Give your crayon collection an earthy vibe by switching over to the crayon rocks. These all natural soy wax crayons come in a set of sixteen vibrant colors and feature a distinct and ergonomic pebble shape designed to improve motor coordination in children.

Set up an entirely edible scene from one of your favorite arcade games using the Pac-Man cookie cutter mold. With these easy to use plastic molds, you’ll be able to bake up some delectable Pac-Man and ghost shaped cookies of any variety.

Freedom and liberty for all is always fashionable. So exhibit your national pride by donning the American flag cape. The patriotic 9 star and 13 stripe design comes with a handy neck strap that provides maximum comfort and mobility without falling off.

Give your room a one of a kind ambiance with the flower filament light bulbs. These artsy light bulbs forgo the traditional filament for a colorful flower design that gives off a soft glow ideal for use as an alternate light source while burning for over 390 hours.

Become the most popular neckbeard at your next shindig by wearing the bottle opener Fedora. This spiffy looking fedora is made from 100% natural fiber and features a strapping leather hatband that houses a removable bottle opener discretely on the side.

Get rid of the unpleasant aroma certain ingredients leave behind after cooking by using the odor rub away bar. Now after handling pungent ingredients like onions or garlic, it only takes a few seconds using this silver colored bar to neutralize the smell completely.

Give your pooch a first class ride when you take him on vacation using the in-cabin pet carrier. This posh transport container features a durable luggage grade nylon on the exterior while the interior pampers your doggy with an ultra plush polyester lining.

Show Mother Earth some love by sporting the stylish planet socks. The novelty design displayed across the ankle features a map of the continents that transform into a small and soft sock globe you can toss around, when rolled up.

Carry everything at once using the bulk grocery bag holding tool and make second trips from the car to your home obsolete. This heavy duty tool is ideal for carrying multiple bags at once and also works great to carry gear on a baby stroller.

The Teddy bear lamp is the ideal lighting fixture for any baby or kid’s nursery. The decapitated Teddy connects via USB with plug adapters and gives off a soft warm glow that won’t overpower the room or wake up your precious bundle of joy as she slumbers.

Create a brighter and more modern atmosphere in the bathroom by accenting it with the LED revision mirror. This easy to install mirror can be placed either vertically or horizontally and comes with built in LEDs around the frame that provide a striking splash of color.

Always be prepared when you hit the trails by bringing along the mini bike tool. This extremely versatile and compact device allows you to conveniently carry a multitude of tools critical for making minor repairs should a situation arise.

Give your offspring their first taste of adventure with the Jeep pedal kart. The study metallic frame keeps your young adventurer safe while the rugged wheels and sturdy construction allows them to maneuver through uneven terrain like a pro.

Help the workday go by a little faster by keeping yourself busy with the foosball pencil erasers. When they’re not correcting your written mistakes, a specially designed cavity in their body lets you slide them onto pencils for an impromptu game of foosball.

Help maintain a healthy lifestyle by tracking your daily activity using the Nike fuel band. This high tech gadget allows you to track calories burned and the number of steps you take so that you can monitor your progress in real time and achieve your goals more easily.

You may not be made of money, but why can’t your suit be? This highly fashionable two-buttoned cash suit envelops your manly frame in an attractive and eye-catching hundred dollar bill motif that’ll have you making it rain wherever you go.

Pummel the enemy into submission by barraging them with the water grenades. These combat ready water balloons come designed with a special print that makes them look like small army green grenades with a liquidy surprise inside.

Turn every meal into a ghetto-fabulous culinary experience by preparing them with the “Cooking With Coolio” cookbook. You’ll go from novice to kitchen pimp in no time at all as you learn to prepare tasty five star meals at one star prices.

Keep your manly facial hair perfectly manicured at all times with the goatee shaving template. It provides you with an easy to follow guide so you end up with a barber shop quality cut without having to leave the comfort of your own bathroom.

Pump up and air out as you ball up and down the court while wearing the Reebok pump up shoes. The moment you begin to pump up, you get the support and protection you need to safely land after a backboard shattering dunk – it’s the only way to fly.

Experience a thrilling ride through the sea while seated on the three person towable inflatable. This cockpit styled towable features a boat hull shaped bottom for unparalleled stability and offers ample seating room for you and two friends to ride comfortably.

Please every palate at your table by baking multiple deserts at once using the 2-in-1 pie pan.  The innovative design of this cooking utensil makes it possible to bake 2 halves of pie at the same time so there’s no compromising on desert.

Give the old game room a touch of elegance with the glass chess board. This classy board is designed with frosted and transparent glass squares and comes with finely crafted glass pieces lined with felt on the bottom so as not to scratch the table.

Walking is for suckers, conserve your precious energy without loosing your mobility with the self balancing electric unicycle. Once you hop on, you’ll be able to zip around town while staying perfectly balanced thanks to a built-in intelligent chip.

Capture treasured moments and print them out in a snap using the Polaroid digital camera. This compact 10 mega pixel camera features a 3 inch LCD screen for viewing your pictures and is SD compatible so you can increase the memory up to 32 gigs.

Take your favorite English automobile for a spin with the LEGO Mini Cooper. This pint sized Mini comes chock full of authentic details such as the classic green and white color scheme, right down to the hood and sporty fog lights to satisfy any car or LEGO enthusiast.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Nail Polish
content: Turn your hands into all-night glow sticks at the next party by getting your nails done with the glow in the dark nail polish. This eye-catching shade goes on easy and leaves a flawless finish that makes your fingertips glow with a bright yellowish green hue.

Quit shredding your hands while you do fake pullups. These crossfit workout gloves will provide added grip while keeping your hands protected – which is important, because if your hands are damaged, you can’t write on Facebook about your crossfit workout.

With the light up basketball you’ll be able to continue your b-ball game long after the court lights go off. This regulation size and weight basketball comes with two built in LED lights that illuminate the ball from within and give it a orange-ish red glow.

Have some fun at the office by getting your unsuspecting coworkers to drink out of the “I’m A Twat” mug. Once your victim begins drinking from their plain white ceramic mug, the hidden message on the bottom lets everyone around know that they’re a twat.

Give your formal wear a twenty first century touch by accenting it with the USB cufflinks. Within the simplistic and elegant silver exterior there lies a concealed 2GB USB revealed by pulling apart the top half from the cufflink’s frame.

Give your art supplies a dash of pizzazz with the colorstripe pencil set. Each pencil features a continuously visible lead encased by a three sided ergonomic design made to improve your grip so you can create with greater ease.

Bring junior along on all your exciting cycling excursions with the pro bike trailer. The trailer conveniently attaches to the seat pole of your bike and provides a safe and comfortable seat for your tiny biker to help you peddle.

titleEN: Risk The Walking Dead Edition Game
content: Experience your favorite board game in a new light by trying to conquer a zombie infested world when playing Risk The Walking Dead edition. This classic game of strategy has received a 21st century post apocalyptic makeover guaranteed to provide riveting gameplay.

E.T. rock on! Our extraterrestrial friends are here to lend you a hand in playing your ax with the alien face guitar pick. Each of these novelty picks comes emblazoned with a small alien face graphic that makes your pick look like a tiny and bodiless alien head.

Free up some space and make your refrigerator cooler with the magnetic bottle holders! The holders are placed on the fridge’s ceiling and come equipped with small magnets designed to suspend your beer bottle by its metallic top.

Keep some emergency cash on you at all times by carrying the keychain stash capsule. This useful keychain allows you to discretely hide a few bills in a waterproof aluminum capsule designed to keep it safe from the elements.

Good music is meant to be shared, and now with the headphone splitter you’ll be able to do just that. Rather than enjoying your favorite tunes alone, the splitter inserts into the headphone port and provides two outlets so you and a buddy can jam out together.

Give your caped crusader outfit a touch of authenticity by topping it off with the Dark Knight Batman mask. This synthetic and durable mask wraps around your entire head to achieve the look of Gotham’s most revered crime fighter.

Whip up delicious treats the entire family can enjoy with the chocolate chip cookies recipe book. This entertaining read contains dozens of inventive baking blueprints that place a twist on the classics so you can satisfy all your trendy vegan and gluten-free friends.

Give your Halloween treats an extra spine-tingling factor by making them with the 3D skull pan. The pan features an even heat distribution design that cooks all your treats evenly while the custom cavities create spooky 3D skull shaped cakes.

Satisfy your twisted and morbid desires as you get ready to start your day by bathing with the blood bath shower gel. This cherry scented gel bears a striking “blood red” hue and comes sealed in novelty container shaped like a human blood transfusion bag.

Satisfy your darkest culinary desires by reading about Miss Chicken in the Fifty Shades of Chicken cookbook. Her exploits with a wealthy, sexy and very hungry chef lead her into risque predicaments that’ll leave you feeling all hot, hungry, and bothered.

Drink your sacred nectar of the gods from a worthy vessel using the skull stein glass. Made in the form of a vicious looking skull with a bone shaped handle, this mug holds up to 16 ounces of frosty goodness while making you look like an utter badass.

Feel like a covert operative every time you go to check the time using the secret agent alarm clock. The clock’s novel and interactive design allows you to project a laser that displays the time onto a flat surface with the pull of the trigger.

Get your daily dose of physical activity wherever you are using the iPad foosball table. Your iPad’s screen transforms into a fully customizable field where you can choose team colors and the amount of opponents you’ll annihilate with a barrage of goals.

Give friends a peek at your perfectly shaped ass by flashing them with the butt towel. This novelty towel is made from 100% cotton velour and comes imprinted with an outrageously comical cartoon butt  flashing everyone through the opening in the rear.

Gorge yourself on nearly every creature in the animal kingdom by snacking on some wild game jerky. Why stop at just beef? It’s a good thing someone asked this question because it led to the creation of some of the most tasty jerky on the market – yum!

Slice through the coldest and hardest blocks of butter with the greatest of ease using the body heat conducting butter knife. The clever design of the knife transfers your body heat to its edge, allowing you to spread the butter smoothly.

Make serving yourself a nice glass of Merlot as easy as filling your cup at the burger joint with the wine dispenser. Now instead of having to lift the bottle and increase the chances of spilling, you can simply place the glass under the spout and voila!

Capture the majesty of the ocean or even the innards of a wave like never before using the waterproof iPhone case. With your phone completely encased, you can get deep in the tube and capture incredible action shots of Mother Nature at her best.

Get a good laugh while you do your part to help the local wildlife with the creepy horse head squirrel feeder. Once the squirrel peeks its fuzzy little head for a quick meal, the feeder’s peculiar shape makes it seem as if he’s wearing a hilarious horse mask.

Make your plain old pool resemble an exotic watering hole straight out of a travel magazine with the LED pool light. Once the LED light enters the scene, your pool takes on an entirely new look and feel as it’s lit up with vibrant color blends and amazing effects.

Have an impromptu day at the course anywhere you go with the portable golf driving range. If you happen to come by a nice spot and feel like having a little practice session, just roll out the mini green, set up the tee and swing to your hearts content.

Give the neighborhood kids permanent nightmares with help from the vampire blood fountain. This 28″ tall fountain portrays Count Dracula in stunning and gory detail as he feeds on his decapitated victim’s head while blood drips down his fangs and mouth.

Chill your drink by unleashing the might of the empire with these stormtrooper ice cubes. The silicone ice cube tray lets you create up to half a dozen cubes in the form of Stormtrooper helmets great for placing a nerdy touch on any drink.

titleEN: CIA Manual Of Trickery And Deception
content: Learn the ins-and-outs of Cold War era espionage with the “CIA Manual of Trickery and Deception”. You’ll be able to delve deep into the mindset of a covert intelligence operative as you read step-by-step instructions of their training and techniques.

Experience a night of sleep unlike no other when you begin using the sleep tracking system while slumbering. This little device stands beside you while you rest and emits a series of lights and sounds designed to improve transitions in and out of sleep.

Take people watching to incredibly fun levels by playing a rousing game of bar bingo the next time you venture to your local watering hole. The card comes littered with the stereotypical barflies like the frat boy, sunglasses guy, and the desperate loner.
